question: Can ferric carboxymaltose be used to treat anemia in inflammatory bowel disease patients?
ideal_answer: Ferric carboxymaltose can be used to treat anemia in patients with inflammatory bowel disease, and prevents recurrence of anemia in these patients, compared with placebo. Treatment with ferric carboxymaltose is efficious, safe and well tolerated in iron-deficient IBD patients.
